title.narrative: Implementing the NDCs to Promote Low-Carbon Growth in Mozambique

description.narrative: The capacity to access climate and private sector finance will be a key determinant of the success of the Government of Mozambique's inclusive green growth and climate agenda. In this context, the Ministry of Economy and Finance (MEF), Mozambique's National Designated Authority (NDA), has requested the support of the GCF to: 1) Support national planning and coordination for implementation of the Nationally Determined Contribution (NDC) and the National Climate Change Adaptation and Mitigation Strategy (NCCAMS); and 2) Support development of a project pipeline assisting FNDS to create project proposals ready for successful submission by them to GCF and/or other public or private financiers.

The capacity to access climate and private sector finance will be a key determinant of the success of the Government of Mozambique's inclusive green growth and climate agenda. In this context, the Ministry of Economy and Finance (MEF), Mozambique's National Designated Authority (NDA), has requested the support of the GCF to: 1) Support national planning and coordination for implementation of the Nationally Determined Contribution (NDC) and the National Climate Change Adaptation and Mitigation Strategy (NCCAMS); and 2) Support development of a project pipeline assisting FNDS to create project proposals ready for successful submission by them to GCF and/or other public or private financiers.

mailing-address.narrative: Global Green Growth Institute, 19F Jeongdong Bldg., 21-15 Jeongdong-gil, Jung-gu Seoul 04540 Republic of Korea

title.narrative: Project Concept Notes Developed
Completed 4 project concept notes, at least 1 ready for FNDS to submit to GCF as DAE, in line with Country Programme (Mth 18)
Completed FNDS project assessment process to produce 4 project ideas (Mth 11)
Completed assessment in energy sector (Mth 9)
Completed assessment in waste sector (Mth 8)
Country Programme for climate finance developed across the climate finance landscape
Gender and social inclusion targets incorporated into the Country Program through mapping of social risks and opportunities across sectors
Accreditation of direct access entities finance programming

description.narrative: Gender Policy & Gender Action Plan and Project Assessment Manual

title.narrative: Completed Gender Policy & Gender Action Plan for FNDS (Mth 5)
Completed Project Assessment Manual for FNDS (Mth 8)
Institutional capacity and coordination mechanisms improved to govern and coordinate climate action and finance
Adequate incorporation of gender, social inclusion, and other social safeguard matters into NDC intervention criteria
Direct Access to climate finance

Mainstreaming of gender into projects submitted to the NDA for review and No-Objection as well as any other donors through the processes of call for proposals and evaluation of proposals within the current government strategies and policies
Country Programme for climate finance developed across the climate finance landscape
Baseline emissions assessment report. (Mth 6)
Emission scenarios and 2030 targets in energy and waste sectors to GoM for NDC submission (Mth 13)
NDA inter-institutional coordination mechanism
Exchange learning trip with Rwanda (Mth 4)
Lessons learned from knowledge exchange are documented summarizing lessons learned and action plan for NDA
Workshop 1 – Climate Finance, Project assessment and Gender mainstreaming for 30 participants (Mth 9)
Workshop 2 – NDC Sectoral Targets for 30 participants (Mth 13)
Workshop 3 – Baseline review for 40 participants (Mth 6)
Climate Finance strategies and project pipeline strengthened
Improved Readiness for NDC Implementation through Pipeline Development in the Waste and Energy Sectors
